translations: （Gila）人名；（西）希拉；（匈）吉洛；（俄、意、塞）吉拉

sentences.sentence: Gila will stay as will all the other stars.
sentences.translation: 吉拉会留下，就像其他球星一样。

sentences.sentence: I don't think Gila has to take more responsibility, Inzaghi is fine and could start.
sentences.translation: 我认为吉拉不会有太多的任务，因扎吉很好可以首发。

sentences.sentence: The fact is, my life has been threatened if I don't come up with an alternative to Gila monster.
sentences.translation: 事实上，我已经收到威胁，如果我不能提供毒蜥之外别的食物，就有生命危险。
